item.title: PowerCLI: Creating custom SATP rule for HPE 3PAR
item.description: A while back we migrated from our old EMC VNX to a new HPE 3PAR array. It all went fine but what kinda slipped our mind is that HPE’s best practice is to create a custom SATP rule that uses RoudRobin as path selection policy and a IOPS limit to 1 in stead of the default 1000. The steps are documented in the HPE 3PAR VMware ESX/ESXi Implementation Guide, but they only show you how to do it through the esx cli.
